title: Allocation of a block of land to the Kumara Vidyalaya - Ratnapura
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, the Minister of Megapolis and Western Development, to vest a block of land, located at Ratnapura, New Town with Kumara Vidyalaya-Ratnapura identified to be necessary for further development activities of the school, was approved by the Cabinet.
